item.title: Recent News
item.description:
[28/10/23] Our paper OSIS: Obstacle-Sensitive and Initial-Solution-First Path Planning has been accepted by the 29th IEEE International Conference on Parallel and Distributed Systems (ICPADS 2023) [CCF C]. Congratulations to Zhang!

[18/10/23] Our paper HBC: Combining Lossy and Lossless Hybrid Bilayer Compression Framework on Time-Series Data has been accepted by the 21th IEEE International Symposium on Parallel and Distributed Processing with Applications (ISPA 2023) [CCF C]. Congratulations to Lu!

[17/06/23] My postgraduate thesis Research on Routing Protocol for Multi-hop Unmanned Aerial Vehicle Ad-hoc Networks (in Chinese) is now available.

[04/05/23] New paper ETD: An Efficient Time Delay Attack Detection Framework for UAV Networks has been published on IEEE Transactions on Information Forensics and Security (TIFS) [CORE A, CCF A, SCI-Q1, IF 7.231].
